headline.main: Study Says Smoking Perils Baby Even If Halted Before Pregnancy; Duration Undetermined

docs.abstract: Holds annual science writers' forum, Hilton Head Island, SC (S)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: HILTON HEAD ISLAND, S.C., Jan. 16 (AP)--New evidence indicates that the negative effects of smoking continue even if women quit before pregnancy, according to a major new study.
docs.snippet: HILTON HEAD ISLAND, S.C., Jan. 16 (AP)--New evidence indicates that the negative effects of smoking continue even if women quit before pregnancy, according to a major new study.
